attributes.action: withdraw section 6 of the Criminal Justice and Immigration Bill, 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Section would create a 'thought crime' as described by George Orwell in '1984'.
 While it would remain lawful to possess and to display extreme images created to sell (advertising), to excite (video games), to entertain (gore movies), to inform (TV news) and to be worshipped (crucifix), there would be created a single category of material possession of which would merit a three year jail term. Only images intended to arouse sexually would become illegal. That is, a state of mind of the user/ owner of images would be a criminal offence.

rejection.details: The petition url "crucifix-porn" may cause offense
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
